dict.acceptation: 肮脏的，污秽的；猥亵的，淫秽的；下流的；

sent.orig: A. Filthy, and filthy but wearable.
I thought sex would be all about screaming, dirty orgasms and filthy talk.
sent.trans: 我以为性爱总是会不停尖叫，肮脏的高潮和肮脏的对话。

sent.orig: However, Bose is so filthy state Oh.
sent.trans: 然而百色是那么哦污秽不堪。

sent.orig: The place was filthy and the neighbours were always complaining.
sent.trans: 这个地方很脏，街坊们一直在抱怨。
